Runjing (Bryan) Liu

I am currently a fourth year PhD student in the U.C. Berkeley Statistics Department. I am advised by Jon McAuliffe. I graduated from Duke University in 2016 with a Bachelor of Science in mathematics.

I am grateful to be supported by the NSF Graduate Research Fellowship.
